title: Collection Status History
description: A record of current and past statuses of the object group and the reason for status changes. Use this class to record the history of and reason for changes in the status of the described collection. Types of status described by this class may, for example, include ownership, management, accessibility or accrual policy over time. Dates reflecting the start and end of the status described by this class should be recorded using an instance of TemporalCoverage. If temporalCoverageEndDate is empty, the status can be inferred to be the current status of the collection.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasMeasurementOrFact
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the MeasurementOrFact class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: hasTemporalCoverage
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the TemporalCoverage class.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The development status of the collection during a specified period.

properties.name: statusChangeReason
properties.description: An explanation of why the collection transitioned to the value set in the status property.

properties.name: statusType
properties.description: A top-level classification of the different categories of status that can be applied to the collection.
